casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jimmy E. McARTHUR. No. 444P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of October 2005 by Defendant for "Petition for Rehearing":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of December 2005."
